publicationStmt.publisher: By T. Cotes, for Peter Whaly, dwelling in North-Hampton,

notesStmt.note: "Collected from that graue, learned, and godly diuine, Mr. Robert Bolton"--Dedication signed I.S.
Errors in paging: p. 109 and 134 misnumbered 119 and 138 respectively.
